32  void KSSide::SetParent( KSSpace* aParent )
33  {
34  for( std::vector< KSSide* >::iterator tSideIt = aParent->fSides.begin(); tSideIt != aParent->fSides.end(); tSideIt++ )
35  {
36  if( (*tSideIt) == this )
37  {
38  aParent->fSides.erase( tSideIt );
39  break;
40  }
41  }
42 
43  aParent->fSides.push_back( this );
44 
45  this->fInsideParent = aParent;
46 
47  this->fOutsideParent = aParent->fParent;
48 
49  return;
50  }
51 
52 }
